means: 缺乏幽默感的，非常严肃的，一本正经的

sentence.Network_en: Does the writer sound crooked or honest, humorless or playful?
sentence.Network_cn: 作者是盗名窃誉还是实事求是?是枯燥无味还是妙趣横生的?

sentence.Network_en: It was a humorless wink; a wink of warning.
sentence.Network_cn: 这不是幽默的眨眼; 这是警告的眨眼.

sentence.Network_en: Defining and analyzing humor is a pastime of humorless people.
sentence.Network_cn: 定义和分析什么是幽默是缺乏幽默感者的游戏.

PerfectNetExp.abs: humoristic 滑稽的humorless 无幽默感的humorlessly 缺乏幽默感地
Lawyer Utterson a taciturn and humorless person ., 律师厄特森先生是个不爱说话 , 一本正经的人.
humorist 讽刺小品作家, humorless 缺乏幽默感的, humoristic 诙谐的
Most of these books are humorless ., 这类书大多枯燥无味.

auth_sentence.content: Her raw, seemingly humorless veneration of money would be bad form almost anywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her raw, seemingly humorless veneration of money would be bad form almost anywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her raw, seemingly humorless veneration of money would be bad form almost anywhere.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Kleffel is a soft-spoken, amiable and thoughtful host, if a bit humorless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Kleffel is a soft-spoken, amiable and thoughtful host, if a bit humorless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Kleffel is a soft-spoken, amiable and thoughtful host, if a bit humorless.

auth_sentence.content: Lest all of this sound impossibly humorless, "Like Someone in Love" does have its playful side.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lest all of this sound impossibly humorless, "Like Someone in Love" does have its playful side.
